COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 2:
Title: Adidas Samba Real vs . Fake Guide 2025: How Can I Tell If... - Extrabux
Content: Original Adidas Samba sneakers are made of high-quality materials and exhibit excellent craftsmanship. Pay attention to the overall build, stitching, and glue work. Check for any signs of sloppy construction or cheap materials.
Source: https://www.extrabux.com/en/guide/8295001

Title: 6 sneaker trends to look out for in 2025 | Vogue Singapore

Source: https://vogue.sg/sneaker-trends-2025/

COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 4:
Title: Samba Shoes | adidas US
Content: NEW & TRENDING .What are adidas Sambas shoes for? The adidas Samba is a soccer shoe first introduced in 1950, designed for training, futsal and street soccer. Its gum rubber outsole with pivot points offers great traction for nimble movements.
Source: https://www.adidas.com/us/samba
